The CSV Engine Device is used to construct data files for charting. The use of this device is not required, but is provided as a convenience. To use your own CSV data simply place the CSV files in the main data directory specified in the plugin configuration dialog.

Field.tooltip: Please enter the maximum number of observations you would like to retain in your CSV files.
Field.Label: Observations:
Enter the maximum number of observations that you would like to retain in your CSV files.

Field.tooltip: Please enter a maximum duration time (in hours).
Field.Label: Duration:

Enter the maximum time duration to apply to your CSV files (in hours). For example, entering 24 will cause observations older than 24 hours to be discarded. Leave empty or enter a value of zero for no limit.

Field.tooltip: Please enter how frequently would you like the plugin to update the CSV data (in seconds).
Field.Label: Refresh Interval:
Enter the desired frequency of CSV updates (in seconds). The default value is 900 (refresh every 15 minutes). Leave empty or enter a value of zero to elect manual refresh only.

Use this section to add a new item. Enter a title and select a device or variable and its companion value then click 'Add Item'. You can limit the number of sources that appear by using the Filter control menu.

Field.tooltip: Please enter a title for your CSV file. This is the name that will be given to the file and used throughout the plugin.
Field.Label: Name:

Use this section to update or delete existing items. The Item List contains those items that have been created by the CSV Engine device. Select an item from the Item List to update its settings or delete it from the plugin.
Note that changes made in this dialog will not be fully committed until you click the "Save" button.

The Matplotlib Parameters device is a repository for the initial settings that the plugin uses *before* any customizations are applied by the plugin. It provides a way to know what the plugin uses for its default parameters. There are presently no configurations available for this device.
